extendedInfo.description: visit http://www.facebook.com/P90XDiaryStart loosing weight with Calorie Meter. One of the simplest, best and easy to use Calorie Traker app for Android. 1) Track food consumed.2) Displays nutritional facts of the food selected.3) Track glasses of water consumed.4) Track your weight loss and muscle transformation with the help of the Measurements.5) Contains built in database with 7000+ food items6) No internet access required.7) Add any missing food in the database.8) Add you favorite food to Favorite List for easy access.9) Performs real time search as you type in the name of the food consumed.10) View measurements graph 11) Share you weight loss progress with your friends over any social network (Facebook, Twitter, Google+ etc), E-Mail, MMS, upload to file servers (Picasa, Evernote etc)

reviews.comment: samsung epic.  cant enter what you eat.  frozen.
reviews.author: A Google User
